doc:
Nick Lucas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nick_Lucas 0 Dominic Nicholas Anthony Lucinese (August 22, 1897 – July 28, 1982), known professionally as Nick Lucas, was the first jazz guitarist to record as a soloist. His popularity during his lifetime came from his reputation as a singer. His signature song was "Tiptoe Through the Tulips". Dominic_Nicholas_Anthony_Lucinese ( August_22_,_1897 – July_28_,_1982 ) , known professionally as Nick_Lucas , was the_first_jazz_guitarist to_record as a_soloist . His_popularity during his_lifetime came from his_reputation as a_singer . His_signature_song was " Tiptoe Through the_Tulips " .
